title: The Candy Cookbook: 40 Recipes for Sweet Success - to Celebrate National Candy Month
description: In 2020, the candy industry in the USA is projected to reach $10 billion in revenue, and every June, the nation honors National Candy Month. Although Americans sure do love candy, as do many other countries around the world, at the top of the list is candy-loving Sweden. With the average American household enjoying around $44 of the sweet stuff on Halloween alone, is it any wonder that there's a whole month dedicated to candy? If you love candy but are counting the cost, then why not create your own candy recipes at home? Making candy at home is great fun. It's perfect for sharing with friends and family, and better yet, itâ€™s inexpensive too. Do you have a sweet tooth? Then celebrate National Candy Month with the Candy Cookbook. Whether you favor fudge, are tempted by toffee, or bananas for bark, discover every homemade candy recipe you could ever need for sweet success.
author: Christina Tosch
